Pisses me off how much landlords take the piss with younger tenants. Students in my gaff have been here for 3 weeks and there’s still no internet & we’ve only just got a kettle/ microwave/ toaster. Over last 4 years I learnt, soon as they have your money they don’t give a fuck

What am I doing with no internet?! Watching the Canadian Debate from 10/7. It’s an educational debate that’s not much different from our own. Cool seeing multiple parties there instead of just two.
